title: News this week: Start your Monday smart
text:
If your day doesn't start until you've gotten up to speed on the latest headlines, then let us introduce you to your new favorite morning fix. Sign up here for the '5 Things' newsletter.

(CNN) Here's what you need to know to Start Your Week Smart .

(You can also get "5 Things You Need to Know Today" delivered to your inbox daily. You give us five minutes, and we give you five things you must know for your weekday, plus a Sunday edition to get your week started smart. Sign up here .)

TODAY

(because seven Latin American nations celebrate independence this week). It's a great time to learn more about the United States' 60 million Hispanic residents and to celebrate the contributions of Hispanic-Americans.

Join Alisyn Camerota as she shares on-set secrets from the beloved sitcom about six friends who first came together 25 years ago after a fateful chat at a Manhattan coffee shop. Our special report starts at 9 ET, only on CNN

MONDAY

JUST WATCHED US officials: Iran seizes two tankers, including British-flagged ship (July) Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH US officials: Iran seizes two tankers, including British-flagged ship (July) 04:44

JUST WATCHED 'Dancing with the Stars' casts Sean Spicer Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH 'Dancing with the Stars' casts Sean Spicer 00:52

TUESDAY

• Israel holds national elections (again). Voters head back to the polls after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu failed following April elections to form a coalition government. Netanyahu has Voters head back to the polls after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu failed following April elections to form a coalition government. Netanyahu has vowed to move to annex parts of the West Bank if he wins re-election. Some say that could deal a fatal blow to any two-state solution with Palestinians.

JUST WATCHED Israel denies report it's spying on the US Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Israel denies report it's spying on the US 02:16

JUST WATCHED Report: Russia has 'active' meddling efforts Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Report: Russia has 'active' meddling efforts 02:31

• Corey Lewandowski heads to Capitol Hill. Trump's ex-campaign manager has Trump's ex-campaign manager has said he intends to comply with a subpoena to appear before the House Judiciary Committee. Lewandowski is cited extensively in the obstruction of justice section of special counsel Robert Mueller's report. The White House has talked about invoking executive privilege to limit his testimony.

JUST WATCHED House Judiciary subpoenas Lewandowski to testify publicly Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH House Judiciary subpoenas Lewandowski to testify publicly 02:23

WEDNESDAY

JUST WATCHED Trump: If Jerome Powell resigned, I wouldn't stop him Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Trump: If Jerome Powell resigned, I wouldn't stop him 00:53

THURSDAY

• The Washington Monument reopens. The national site's 37-month closure ends The national site's 37-month closure ends with the unveiling of a modernized elevator control system and a new security screening facility.

JUST WATCHED Washington Monument lit up like Apollo mission rocket Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Washington Monument lit up like Apollo mission rocket 00:53

FRIDAY

• Mass climate strikes begin. Activists plan an Activists plan an intergenerational event in Washington to call attention to the climate crisis and demand elected leaders' action. Hundreds of Amazon workers also are due to walk out that day, saying their employer isn't doing enough to stem the climate emergency. These coincide with the start of a weeklong Global Climate Strike campaign.

JUST WATCHED Meet the teen changing the game for climate change Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Meet the teen changing the game for climate change 02:18

• Will anyone actually 'Storm Area 51?' Hundreds of thousands of people said online they'll attend Hundreds of thousands of people said online they'll attend an event dubbed , "Storm Area 51, They Can't Stop All of Us." It started as a tongue-in-cheek plan to blitz Nevada's Ground Zero of UFO conspiracy but quickly got out of hand, with the US military pushing back and the creator terrified it will become a " humanitarian disaster ." Will anyone show? Only the aliens know.

JUST WATCHED 'Storm Area 51' creator: It was a joke Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH 'Storm Area 51' creator: It was a joke 02:57

SATURDAY
description: Bahrain Prince's visit. Netanyahu's election vow. Corey Lewandowski. Elections & social media. Fed rates. Washington Monument. "Storm Area 51." Sean Spicer. Oktoberfest! Here's what the next six days will bring.
